## FlowTableSelection.formatText() method

Creates an operation that applies the specified text style on the current selection

**Signature:**

```typescript
/** @override */
formatText(style: TextStyle, options?: TargetOptions): FlowOperation | null;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  style | [TextStyle](./scribing.textstyle.md) | The style to apply |
|  options | [TargetOptions](./scribing.targetoptions.md) | _(Optional)_ Options that provide operation behavior |

**Returns:**

[FlowOperation](./scribing.flowoperation.md) \| null

## Remarks

`null` is returned when the operation would be a no-op or not applicable on the current selection.
